mapper.select: SELECT * FROM POINT a INNER JOIN USERS b ON (a.U_ID = b.U_ID) ORDER BY PT_REGDATE DESC
SELECT * FROM ORDERS o INNER JOIN USERS u ON (o.U_ID = u.U_ID) INNER JOIN STORE_INFO si ON (o.SI_CODE = si.SI_CODE) WHERE O_ORDER_STATE = '주문취소' ORDER BY O_ORDER_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE SYSTEM_SETTING SET VALUE = CASE WHEN KEY= 'point_use' THEN #{point_use} ELSE #{point_percentage} END WHERE KEY IN ('point_use','point_percentage')
mapper.select: SELECT DATE(O_ORDER_DATE) AS O__DATE, COUNT(O_CODE) AS O_SEQ, SUM(O_TOTAL_PRICE) AS O_TOTAL_PRICE FROM ORDERS GROUP BY DATE(O_ORDER_DATE) ORDER BY DATE(O_ORDER_DATE) DESC;
